A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''January 7, 2010''', at 20:10 UTC<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "(15:11:20) <Notch> vede: Try the indev client now. Is the line gone?"</ref>.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed graphical glitch what caused appearing line on the ground.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "(15:07:23) <vede> Notch, I hate to say it, but I think the moire looked better than that line that's always on the ground. :/"..."(15:10:44) <Notch> vede: The line is going away in a few minutes when the indev version has been updated"..."(15:13:33) <vede> Ah, yes, the line is gone, Notch."</ref>
